about.title: About TVLP
about.subtitle: Redefining Value Creation in DeFi
about.missionText: TVLP aims to revolutionize the DeFi landscape with substantial backing and deep liquidity reserves. Our protocol demonstrates how proper funding and liquidity management create sustainable value and institutional-grade market depth.
about.conceptText: Built with significant initial funding and fully seeded liquidity reserves, TVLP delivers stable execution, low slippage, and transparent price discovery. Our approach ensures smooth trading experiences for all participants.
about.innovationText: Our protocol mechanics ensure optimal liquidity distribution and efficient price discovery, creating a stable and transparent trading environment that benefits both retail and institutional participants.
about.ctaText: Learn how our liquidity-first model works in detail.

buy.title: How to Buy TVLP
buy.subtitle: Get TVLP tokens in 3 simple steps
buy.step1Text: Connect your TronLink wallet to access the TVLP ecosystem
buy.step2Text: Select how much USDT you want to exchange for TVLP tokens
buy.step3Text: Approve the transaction and receive your TVLP tokens instantly
buy.instructionsText:
1. Install TronLink wallet extension
2. Connect your wallet to our site
3. Navigate to SunSwap USDT/TVLP pool
4. Enter desired amount and confirm swap

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our Journey to DeFi Innovation

roadmap.q4_2026_text: Expansion of the TVLP ecosystem with new integrations and on-chain products.
roadmap.ctaText: Follow our milestones as we expand listings, governance and partnerships.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TVLP
faq.a1: TVLP (True Value Liquidity Protocol) is an innovative DeFi token that demonstrates how minimal liquidity can create maximum value through strategic tokenomics and protocol mechanics.
faq.q2: How can I buy TVLP tokens?
faq.a2: You can purchase TVLP tokens through SunSwap by connecting your TronLink wallet and swapping USDT for TVLP in the dedicated liquidity pool.
faq.q3: Why does the price work with minimal liquidity?
faq.a3: Our protocol is designed with unique mechanics that create price stability and growth through controlled supply, strategic burns, and utility-driven demand rather than relying on deep liquidity pools.
faq.q4: Is TVLP safe to invest in?
faq.a4: TVLP is built on the secure Tron blockchain with audited smart contracts. However, as with all DeFi investments, please do your own research and only invest what you can afford to lose.
faq.q5: What makes TVLP different from other tokens?
faq.a5: TVLP's unique approach to tokenomics focuses on creating sustainable value through minimal liquidity, proving that innovation in protocol design can outperform traditional high-liquidity models.
faq.moreText: Check the full FAQ or ask in our community.

contacts.title: Get in Touch
contacts.subtitle: Connect with the TVLP Community
contacts.community: Join our community to stay updated on the latest TVLP developments, participate in governance discussions, and connect with fellow token holders.
contacts.support: For technical support, partnership inquiries, or general questions, don't hesitate to reach out through any of our communication channels.
contacts.emailDescription: For general inquiries, partnerships and collaborations, contact us by email.
contacts.telegramDescription: Join our Telegram group for live updates, discussions and community support.
